A bird snare is a type of trap used in the Hunter skill. The bird snaring technique is used to catch several birds. With the required Hunter level, the player may set up a bird snare and wait for a bird to approach the trap.

If the prey is successfully caught, the snare will trap the bird, and the player will have the option to "check" the trap. If not successful, the trap will still snap, and the player will have to reset it. A bird snare will not catch birds if the user is standing directly on the bird snare.

Smoking a trap will increase the catch rate by +2%.[1] Due to the low increase of the catch rate, most players believe that smoking traps doesn't justify the extra actions it takes.

Bird snares may be bought from Aleck Aleck's Hunter Emporium. in Yanille or the Nardah Hunter Shop in Nardah. One can also be obtained for free by searching the south-western crate in Hugor's house at Land's End.

Bird snares are also obtainable from a Hunter kit, the only way native to the Fremennik region to acquire one and necessary to complete the Fremennik Diary.

Creatures[edit | edit source]

The following Hunter creatures may be caught using the bird snaring technique.

Creature Exp. Location
1 Crimson swift 34 Feldip Hunter area, Isle of Souls and Kebos Swamp
5 Golden warbler 47 Uzer Hunter area
9 Copper longtail 61 Piscatoris Hunter area, Isle of Souls and Kourend Woodland
11 Cerulean twitch 64.6 Rellekka Hunter area
19 Tropical wagtail 95 Feldip Hunter area

Multiple traps[edit | edit source]

Bird snaring can be done with multiple traps at once, with the maximum amount of traps depending on the player's Hunter level.

Traps

20 2
40 3
60 4
80 5

[[File:Bird snare detail.png|left|130px]]
A '''bird snare''' is a type of trap used in the [[Hunter]] skill. The bird snaring technique is used to catch several [[bird]]s. With the required Hunter level, the player may set up a bird snare and wait for a bird to approach the trap.

If the prey is successfully caught, the snare will trap the bird, and the player will have the option to "check" the trap. If not successful, the trap will still snap, and the player will have to reset it. A bird snare will not catch birds if the user is standing directly on the bird snare.

Smoking a trap will increase the catch rate by +2%.{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/793829284288851968|date=2 November 2016|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20190815201833/https:/twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/793829284288851968|archivedate=15 August 2019|quote=+2% for the smoke, +3% for the bait.}} Due to the low increase of the catch rate, most players believe that smoking traps doesn't justify the extra actions it takes.

Bird snares may be bought from [[Aleck]] [[Aleck's Hunter Emporium.]] in [[Yanille]] or the [[Nardah Hunter Shop]] in [[Nardah]]. One can also be obtained for free by searching the south-western crate in [[Hugor]]'s house at [[Land's End]].

Bird snares are also obtainable from a [[Hunter kit]], the only way native to the Fremennik region to acquire one and necessary to complete the [[Fremennik Diary]].
